## What is Functional Data Analysis (FDA)

Functional Data Analysis deals with repeated measures over time, whether the time intervals are evenly spaced or sporadic. 

## Functional Principal Component Analysis (FPCA)

Functional data is often high dimensional. FPCA offers a solution to reduce the data dimensions.
